participant_id.Description: Unique BIDS identifier for the participant in this study.

p_gish2_abstinences.Description: Have you talked with your child about: Abstinence/waiting to have sex / Ha hablado con su niño(a) sobre: Absitencia/esperar a tener relaciones sexuales | 1 = Yes; 2 = No; 3 = Decline to answer

p_gish2_safe_practices.Description: Have you talked with your child about: Safe sex practices / Ha hablado con su niño(a) sobre:Prácticas de relaciones sexuales seguras | 1 = Yes; 2 = No; 3 = Decline to answer

p_gish2_convo.Description: Have you talked with your child about: Other conversation about sex / Ha hablado con su niño(a) sobre: Otras conversaciones sobre sexo | 1 = Yes; 2 = No; 3 = Decline to answer

kbi_p_c_gay.Description: Is you/your child gay?/  ¿Su niño(a) es homosexual? | 1 = Yes /Sí; 2 = Maybe/Don't know /Tal vez/No sé; 0 = No/ No; 4 = Decline to answer /Niego contestar

kbi_p_c_gay_problems.Description: Has this caused any problems for you/your child with your family or with kids at school?/  ¿Esto le ha causado a su niño(a) algún problema con su familia o con los niños en la escuela? | 1 = Not at all /Para nada; 2 = Some /Algo; 3 = A lot /Mucho; 4 = Decline to answer /Niego contestar

kbi_p_c_gay_l.Description: Is your child gay? ¿Su niño(a) es homosexual? | 1 = Yes Sí; 2 = Maybe/Don't know Tal vez/No sé; 3 = No No; 4 = Decline to answer Niego contestar

kbi_p_c_gay_problems_l.Description: Since we last saw you, has this caused any problems for your child with your family or with kids at school? Desde la última vez que nos vimos, ¿esto le ha causado a su niño(a) algún problema con su familia o con los niños en la escuela? | 1 = Not at all Para nada; 2 = Some Algo; 3 = A lot Mucho; 4 = Decline to answer Niego contestar
